price: また、われら*は確かに、彼らが導かれるようにと、ムーサー*に啓典（トーラー*）を授けた。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
